title: All such buildings where SWH systems are to be installed will have open sunny roof area available for installation of SWH system
clause_text: All such buildings where SWH systems are to be installed will have open sunny roof area available for installation of SWH system.
section: Special Provisions; for installation of Solar Water Heating (SWH) Systems.

source_pdf.text_snippet: All such buildings where SWH systems are to be installed will have open sunny roof area available for installation of SWH system.
